page.title: 20DOMESDAY WORKERS IN DIPTON.
page.content:
{The previous 19 pages have taken three {months to compile.This would not have {been possible without the work of many {people.The 77 Junior children of Saint {Patrick's School have researched from {Local Libraries,interviewed relations, {surveyed 200 people,& discussed with {one another & their teachers,to arrive {at this final account.}So we publicly} thank Miss M.Emerson & Junior 3,Mrs.M. Richardson & Junior 2,Mrs.C.O'Sullivan & Junior 1,Mrs.M.Pinkerton for the typing of the Survey,the Parents for their support,& the Headmaster,Mr.H. Bartrope, for co-ordinating & editing all the work.{The only regret of the {editor was that he had to omit so much {information due to lack of space.
However,we believe this to be a true & accurate account of life,in & around Dipton in 1985.
